features: 5 FAB FACE MASKS TO SOOTHE & HYDRATE - Unleash your wild side with 7th Heaven face masks and treat your skin. These playful, animal-printed sheet masks for children are packed with a blend of fruity ingredients to soothe, hydrate and moisturise

PERFECT FOR PARTIES & SLEEPOVERS - Bright, fun, and creative, these moisturising face masks are an exciting way to introduce kids to skincare. Gentle yet effective, they're ideal for parties, sleepovers, or as a playful gift

SUITABLE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN - This face mask set is gentle enough for even the most delicate skin, making it fun and safe for everyone! Just pop on a mask, kick back, and let it work its magic—hydrating your skin for a soft, radiant glow

5 FUN & FRUITY BLENDS - Get ready for a fruity adventure with these biodegradable sheet masks. Designed to fit all face sizes perfectly and bursting with fruity goodness, they make pampering both fun and refreshing

GENUINE 7TH HEAVEN SKINCARE SET – For over 30 years, 7th Heaven has made the world a happier place for both humans & animals. Their cruelty-free beauty products are inspired by nature’s treasures, with no hidden nasties, just pure goodness
description: Product Description Treat yourself to fun pampering with this fabulous skincare set Packed with 5 sheet masks, this fantastic set is all about giving your skin a much-needed glow while deeply cleansing and hydrating. Whether you're unwinding after a busy school day or getting ready for a sleepover party, this nourishing face mask set is your ticket to radiant, revitalised skin. product_details_tab_data.Safety Warning: For external use only. Test a small amount on the inner arm, leave for 5 minutes and rinse off. If irritation occurs cease use. Avoid contact with the eyes - if contact occurs wash out with water.
